title: BSP remains relevant, Muslims will also vote for it: Amit Shah - The Indian Express
content:
1. BSP remains relevant, Muslims will also vote for it: Amit Shah  The Indian Express
  2. Amit Shah On Rahul Gandhi's China Remark | Amit Shah Exclusive Interview | CNN News18  CNN-News18
  3. UP polls: No bahubali here, only Bajrangbali now, says Amit Shah  Times of India
  4. Full transcript of Amit Shah interview: One who performs will be elected by the public, says home minister  Firstpost
  5. Exclusive Interview | This Election Not About Muslims or Yadavs or Hindus, Says Amit Shah on Yogi Adityanat  News18
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: “It is my personal belief that people of all religions should accept the school’s dress code. And the issue is now in court, and the court is conducting its hearings on the matter. Whatever it decides should be followed by all,” Amit Shah said in an interview with News18 TV channel.
